contents:
I've posted Billions and Billions of threads on this site about the disruptive and vicious behavior of those Monolingual Mandalorian Bad Hombres, and I don't want to repeat the words here - the admins won't let me. But I feel sorry for your mindless posting of the REAL FAKE NEWS (not CNN) of my friend Vlad's family. IT'S JUST SAD!
#TrumpishWillBeTrendingInPincongJustLikeXinese
#庆丰话川语双修# #毅进语词汇太少#
